snippet.title: Saturnalia – Official Gameplay Overview Trailer [4K 60fps]
snippet.description:
Saturnalia [http://www.saturnaliagame.com/] is a fever dream inspired in equal parts by authentic Sardinian culture and classic Italian giallo horror films. The narrative revolves around a mysterious, centuries-old ritual that occurs every year on the night of the winter solstice, as each of the game’s four playable characters must utilize their unique abilities and confront their own painful memories in order to expose the secrets haunting the town and ultimately escape Gravoi.

Coming 2022!
